urologists.name: Dr. Ashis Chawla
urologists.title: Staff Urologist
urologists.credentials: Diplomat of the American Board of Urology, Fellow of the Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Canada
urologists.specialization: Minimally Invasive Surgery, Benign and Malignant Urological Conditions
urologists.bio: Dr. Chawla is Staff Urologist at St. Joseph's Health Centre and Cleveland Clinic Canada, as well as an Associate Urologist at Toronto Rehabilitation Centre and Lecturer in the Department of Surgery at the University of Toronto. His practice focuses on treating both benign and malignant urological conditions with a special interest in minimally invasive surgery. He is actively involved in medical education and research in minimally invasive surgery, with an emphasis on renal and prostate cancer.

urologists.name: Dr. Umesh Jain
urologists.title: Staff Urologist
urologists.bio: Dr. Jain's practice includes general urology with special interest in Uro-Oncology and Endourology. He has been actively involved in teaching undergraduate medical students, urology residents, and clinical fellows, and has won the outstanding teacher award in the Division of Urology on numerous occasions.

urologists.name: Dr. Anthony McLean
urologists.title: Staff Urologist
urologists.bio: Dr. McLean is a Staff Urologist at St. Joseph's Health Centre, providing comprehensive urological care to patients.

urologists.name: Dr. Hanmu Yan
urologists.title: Staff Urologist, Assistant Professor of Surgery
urologists.specialization: Minimally Invasive Urologic Surgery, BPH, Kidney Stones, Urinary Tract Cancers
urologists.bio: Dr. Yan is a Staff Urologist at St. Joseph's Health Centre and an Assistant Professor of Surgery at the University of Toronto's Department of Surgery. He completed medical school and residency at the University of Toronto, with specialized training in minimally invasive urologic surgery. His practice focuses on surgeries for BPH, kidney stones, and cancers of the urinary tract.
